name: abhishek03312.github.io
about: This repository points to the code for my personal website. I have primarily used ReactJS to build my website along with CSS for the design and UI.

name: spam-filter
about: Spam filter, used to filter spam text messages from the authentic text messages. Decision trees and random forest were used with apporpraite features engineered for the supervised classification task.

name: Speech_Emotion_recognition
about: A research project to test the use of speech emotion recognition on different audio files extracted from the user specified audio clip. The application detects different speakers as well as the emotions of a each speaker. ANNs and Siamese networks were used to achieve the tasks.

name: Intelligent-Agents-Play-Rummy
about: A research experiement to study the effects of card counting in Indian Rummy. This was subnitted as a project as part of course requirements.

name: Databases
about: A complete database platform to handle different types of actions and transactions for an online shopping platform. Primarily built using SQL server, this project accurately considers the use of Triggers and other operations for specific user actions.

name: Video-Game-Credit-Extraction
about: A web application to extract the end credits from game credit videos. Different algorithms such as OCR and functions from OpenCV were used to extract the content. The user interface was built using ReactJS and the backend framework built using Flask along with mongoDB to store data.

name: NLP-assignment2
about: Project Repository for the 2nd assignment as part of course requirements for CZ4045.

name: NLP-Assignment1
about: Project Repository for the 1st assignment as part of course requirements for CZ4045.

name: Data-Analysis-with-Computer
about: Project aiming to analyse the expenditure trends of people based on their income as well factors such as marital status, education level etc,. This was done in order to aid the marketing strategy for a company dealing with online shopping.

name: AI
about: Code Repository for the course CZ3005. This project aims to explore operations in artifical intelligence applications. The code base is primarily in Prolog.

name: JobsUpply
about: A web application to suggest jobs to students and fresh graduates based on their skills and their education field. The application also suggests courses for the users to help them learn the necessary skills that may be required for a particular job.

name: Course-Registration-System
about: A console based course registration system in Java. The applications mimics a real world system allowing students to add/drop courses and change class timings.

name: Genome-searching-Algorithms
about: The aim of this project is to propose an algorithm to find sub sequences in a genome sequence and compare efficiency of the proposed algorithms.

name: Graph-Algorithms
about: This project aims to find the closest hospital to every city given a real word road network. The entire road network is represented as a graph with each city and hospital represented as nodes and the edges representing the roads connecting them.

name: Music-Moods
about: A music recommendation system to suggest top 30 similar songs based on the sentiment of the songs. The system also consist of a simple application built using tkinter.

name: Canteen-information-system
about: A simple application built using tkinter to view the food menu of different stalls in NTU food canteens.
